choicegroup.label: If the diagonals are reversed, do you expect the diagonal members of the truss that are highlighted in green to be in tension, compression, or both tension and compression due to downward loads as shown by the black arrows?

div.p: The diagonals in this case will be in tension and will balance out the downward loading.
